attributes.action: Ease the credit crunch for individuals as well as businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Northern Rock and the Governemnt supported merger between HBOS and Lloyds/TSB, it is evident the Government wants to treat the Banking sector different to other sectors. However, individuals are suffering real hardship under the credit crunch and mounting debt. For those who are struggling, and have attempted to pay their way, a compulsory scheme for a reduction in debt, or write off of smaller debts to reduce the debt burden and help poorer people to start living again. This is to replace IVA nd Bankruptcy.
